markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs=""
>
[Grisantian Pelt Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1475)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 35</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Grisantian Pelt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1474)

</column>

---

Grisantian pelt armor is immune to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) damage, and its Hardness is doubled against piercing or slashing damage. Wearing armor made from grisantian pelt also grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC and saving throws against attacks and spells that deal fire damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Grisantian Pelt Armor (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 35</row>

**Price** 1,800 gp (+180 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include grisantian pelt worth at least 900 gp + 90 gp per Bulk.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Grisantian Pelt Armor (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 35</row>

**Price** 33,000 gp (+3,300 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include grisantian pelt worth at least 16,500 gp + 1,650 gp per Bulk.
name: Grisantian Pelt Armor (High-Grade)
